attributes.action: ensure that WW1 veteran Henry Allingham, aged 113 and now recognised as the World's oldest man receives a knighthood or other appropriate honour, in recognition of his efforts during the war.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Henry Allingham is now 113 and is the oldest man in the world.  This hero who saw action in WW1 is one of the few living links we have with that time, and it is wholley appropriate that he is honoured by the Queen with a Knighthood.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.direct.gov.uk/honours
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
